title: Bandwidth & Data Rate Conversions (bps ⇄ kbps ⇄ Mbps ⇄ MB/s ⇄ Gbps)

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: 1 byte = 8 bits 1 kbps = 1,000 bps 1 Mbps = 1,000,000 bps MB/s = (Mbps ÷ 8) Transfer time (s) = File size (bits) ÷ Bandwidth (bits/s)
